name: Tadpole Treble
blurb: A musical adventure with a focus on fun, challenging gameplay! A game from the creator of Brawl in the Family.

rewards.reward: No Reward
*EGG TIER* Welcome aboard, soon-to-be-hatchling! A single dollar will net you a lovely Tadpole Treble wallpaper, a full song straight from the game, and access to our backer updates. Whatta deal!

*NOTE TIER* Slap on a pair of headphones and prepare yourself--the full digital soundtrack of Tadpole Treble is available on this budget-priced tier! Fans of Matthew's music from Brawl in the Family and the Turnabout Musical project will definitely want to consider this one.

*TADPOLE TIER* Slap on a pair of headphones and get ready for adventure, because you're getting your own digital copy of Tadpole Treble! DRM-free, of course. This reward tier includes any single version of the game--PC or Mac, or the Wii U if that stretch goal is hit!

*BUBBLE TIER* Want to immerse yourself in the world of Tadpole Treble a bit more? Then dive in at this level to get the digital game, plus the digital Travel Guide! It's dozens of pages of art, stage layouts, and characters--the perfect companion to the game!

*CLEF TIER* If you have an ear for music, listen up! With this tier, you get the full game, plus the entire digital original soundtrack! The OST of the game will feature around 20 tracks across a variety of genres, all composed by Matthew Taranto, and the price is tough to beat!

*TRIFECTA TIER* A wonderful little package for the savvy backer, this tier includes the full game, the entire soundtrack, and the digital Travel Guide! It's the game-art-music Triforce, a perfect storm of entertainment!

*EARLY PELICAN TIER* Want to try Tadpole Treble yourself? Don't hesitate to jump on this action--this backer level gives you everything above (the game, the soundtrack, and the digital Travel Guide)...plus a two-level playable demo! Most rewards will be reaching you next year, but the demo will be released next MONTH!

*TURTLE TIER* If you want to leave your mark on Tadpole Treble forever, here's a good starting place.  This tier gives you the full game, soundtrack, and digital Travel Guide...and will also feature your name in the in-game Backer Credits! Who can resist?

*POLLYWOG TIER* Like what you see so far? Then try out this lovely package, which gives you all of the above: the full game, the soundtrack, the digital Travel Guide, a playable demo next month, and your name in the Backer Credits!

*MAESTRO TIER* A brand new bonus tier has been added! For this specialized level, you get your own digital sheet music for a selection of Tadpole Treble songs! Musicians who want to jam out on their own to the compositions should definitely keep this one in mind. It also comes with the game, the soundtrack, the digital guide, the Backer Credits, and the demo!

*PLUSH TIER* If you love your Dededoll, you might want to listen up. This backer level contains all the goodies of the Turtle Tier (game, soundtrack, digital guide, Backer Credits name) and adds an adorable Baton Mini-Plush! This puffy pal will be made of high-quality materials and will liven up any room. Just keep her away from snapping turtles.

*FROG TIER* Do you remember when game manuals were a staple of the gaming experience, and were really fun to read through? If so, you might consider this level, which gives you the Pollywog Tier's set of goods (game, soundtrack, digital Guide, demo, Backer Credits name), but also adds in a glorious PHYSICAL Travel Guide to peruse for your amusement!

*BULLFROG TIER* This upgrade to the Frog Tier includes the goods from that (game, soundtrack, digital Guide, demo, Backer Credits name), but your physical Travel Guide will be signed by us, the creators of Tadpole Treble!

*BATON TIER* The definitive Tadpole Treble bundle! Dive in at this level and you'll wriggle away with the following goodies: the full game, the digital Travel Guide, the soundtrack, the playable demo, the Backer Credits name, the physical Travel Guide autographed by us, and the adorable Baton Mini-Plush!

*MAESTRO BATON TIER* By popular request, we've got what might be an even more definitive Tadpole Treble bundle! This gets you all the Baton Tier goodies, plus a selection of digital sheet music songs from the game!

*PINK PUFF TIER* Are you a Brawl in the Family fan? If you've been on the fence about getting a book, consider this level: you get the hardcover BitF: Volume One book, plus the full Tadpole Treble game!

*GRUMPY PENGUIN TIER* This tier nets you the Brawl in the Family: Volume One hardcover, plus Tadpole Treble, the soundtrack, the digital Travel Guide, next month's playable demo, and the Backer Credits.

*MASKED MENACE TIER* This tier is exactly like the one above, except the BitF: Volume One hardcover is signed and sketched in by the artist, Matthew Taranto! Naturally, you also get the game, soundtrack, digital Travel Guide, demo, and the Backer Credits.

*MATTHEW'S TIER* Jump in here to get top-notch goods from Matthew's two major projects! On one hand is the autographed Brawl in the Family: Volume One hardcover book, complete with over 200 comics and tons of bonus material. On the other, the Baton Tier, which contains the game, the soundtrack, a digital Travel Guide, a signed physical Travel Guide, the playable demo, and your name in the Backer Credits.  It's quite a haul!

*ART TIER* Pledge here to receive a custom-made, hand-drawn piece of art, which will be signed and mailed out to you! This reward is a physical one, so you may frame it, snuggle it, fold it into an airplane, etc. This tier also includes all the goods at the Pollywog Tier, meaning you get the game, soundtrack, digital Travel Guide, Backer Credits name, and demo!

*ART DX TIER* This level gives you the hand-drawn, custom-made, autographed physical drawing as detailed above...and you also get everything in the Baton Tier! The game, the soundtrack, the digital guide, the demo, the Backer Credits, the signed Physical Guide, and the Baton Mini-Plush!

*RIVER DEITY TIER* Help us design the game! At this backer level, we'll put in any river creature of your choosing into the game! You will also make suggestions on its design and colors, and how it can interact with Baton in-game. You also snag everything in the Pollywog Tier: the game, soundtrack, digital Travel Guide, demo, and Backer Credits.

*CHOIR TIER* Calling all singers! At this impressive level, your voice will be in the game! Indeed, during the credits sequence, a reprise of an earlier song will be sung, and you get to sing a line of it! So start polishing up those pipes, as everyone will be able to hear your dulcet tones upon beating the game. This level also includes the smorgasbord of goods at the Baton Tier level: the game, the soundtrack, the digital guide, the demo, the Backer Credits name, the signed physical Travel Guide, and the Baton Mini-Plush.

BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND:
*RETURN OF POSEIDON TIER* Rule the waters with this backer level! Be prominently featured near the beginning of the credits as a Producer...or any title you want! (but let's keep it appropriate, please!) Comes with the bundle of joy that is the Baton Tier: game, soundtrack, signed physical guide, digital guide, demo, and Baton Mini-Plush.

Estimated delivery: Dec 2014
Add $15 USD to ship outside the US

*POSEIDON TIER* Rule the waters with this backer level! Be prominently featured near the beginning of the credits as a Producer...or any title you want! (but let's keep it appropriate, please!) Comes with the bundle of joy that is the Baton Tier: game, soundtrack, signed physical guide, digital guide, demo, and Baton Mini-Plush.

*WHALE SHARK TIER* For those that want almost everything! This tier grants you all the non-limited rewards (wallpaper, free song, digital OST, digital Travel Guide, physical signed Guide, Baton Mini-Plush, signed BitF hardcover, sheet music bundle, playable demo, Backer Credits), and TWO of the following four options: A) a signed original piece of art, B) a river creature of your choice in the game, C) the ability to sing a line of the credits, and/or D) an executive producer credit (or one of your choosing)\r\nJust pick any two of the above (A, B, C, D) you want. Think of this as a "Diet" Leviathan for a lower price!

*LEVIATHAN TIER* Welcome to the ultimate stage! The backer level that puts all others to shame, this one nets you everything listed above! So, in order, that's...the full game! The digital soundtrack! The digital Travel Guide! The physical Travel Guide--signed! The demo! The Backer Credits! The Sheet Music bundle! The Baton Mini-Plush! The Brawl in the Family: Volume One hardcover book--signed! An exclusive, hand-drawn, physical piece of art--signed! Your choice of river creature in the game! Your voice in the credits song! And finally, the special Producer credit of your choice! Whew...this is the big lunker, folks. As a bonus, all shipping (even international) for this tier is free of charge. Jump in if you're feeling saucy!

*KRAKEN TIER* Check that--we have a NEW ultimate stage now! Composers, listen up! If you hit this super-deluxe tier, we will PROGRAM YOUR ORIGINAL SONG AS A STAGE IN THE GAME. Yes, it'll be your sheet music as the level, complete with us adding elements and obstacles onto the beat, and it'll be totally playable by everyone who gets the game! Now, it'll likely be a secret stage unlocked via a code you get upon beating the main game or something, but it'll certainly be in every copy of the game and can be unlocked normally. You'll be credited as the writer of the song and the stage can be named (mostly) whatever you like. Check our very first Update for more details and limitations. This tier also gets you all of the "non-limited" rewards; everything in Matthew's Tier: wallpaper, music, digital OST, digital Travel Guide, physical signed Guide, Baton Mini-Plush, the signed BitF hardcover, the sheet music bundle, the playable demo, and your name in the Backer Credits! We'll throw in free shipping anywhere in the world for this tier too.
